abstract: News that the Manhattan museum was changing how it would display the shuttle, gave an opening to advocates for other institutions that want it, including the National Museum of the U.S. Air Force outside of Dayton.
snippet: News that the Manhattan museum was changing how it would display the shuttle, gave an opening to advocates for other institutions that want it, including the National Museum of the U.S. Air Force outside of Dayton.

headline.main: Ohio Senator Asks NASA to Wrest Shuttle From Intrepid Museum
